com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class Texting

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.Texting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, OnPauseListener, OnResumeListener, OnStopListener, OnInitializeListener

    public class Texting
extends AndroidNonvisibleComponent
implements Component, OnResumeListener, OnPauseListener, OnInitializeListener, OnStopListener
    A component capable of sending and receiving text messages via SMS.
    Author:
    markf@google.com (Mark Friedman), ram8647@gmail.com (Ralph Morelli)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  Texting.AsyncAuthenticate
      Handles authentication needed for sending via Google Voice
      (package private) class  Texting.AsyncSendMessage
      Asynchronously Sends a text message via Google Voice.
      (package private) class  Texting.GoogleVoiceUtil
      Utility class built from Free Software (GPLv3 or later) by cannibalizing parts of Voice.java of the free software package, Google-Voice-Java:

    • Method Detail

      • onInitialize

        public void onInitialize()
        Callback from Form. No incoming messages can be processed through MessageReceived until the Form is initialized. Messages are cached until this method is called.
        Specified by:
        onInitialize in interface OnInitializeListener

      • PhoneNumber

        public void PhoneNumber(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Sets the phone number to send the text message to when the SendMessage function is called.
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - a phone number to call

      • PhoneNumber

        public java.lang.String PhoneNumber()
        The number that the message will be sent to when the SendMessage method is called. The number is a text string with the specified digits (e.g., 6505551212). Dashes, dots, and parentheses may be included (e.g., (650)-555-1212) but will be ignored; spaces should not be included.

      • Message

        public void Message(java.lang.String message)
        The text message to that will be sent when the SendMessage method is called.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send when the SendMessage function is called.

      • Message

        public java.lang.String Message()
        The text message that will be sent when the SendMessage method is called.

      • SendMessage

        public void SendMessage()
        Send a text message

      • processPendingQueue

        private void processPendingQueue()
        Sends pending messages that have been queued awaiting authentication.

      • MessageReceived

        public static void MessageReceived(java.lang.String number,
                                   java.lang.String messageText)
        Event that's raised when a text message is received by the phone.
        Parameters:
        number - the phone number that the text message was sent from.
        messageText - the text of the message.

      • GoogleVoiceEnabled

        public boolean GoogleVoiceEnabled()
        If this property is true, then SendMessage will attempt to send messages using Google voice.
        Returns:
        'true' or 'false' depending on whether you want to use Google Voice for sending/receiving messages.

      • GoogleVoiceEnabled

        public void GoogleVoiceEnabled(boolean enabled)
        If this property is true, then SendMessage will attempt to send messages over WiFi, using Google voice.
        Parameters:
        enabled - Set to 'true' or 'false' depending on whether you want to use Google Voice to send/receive messages.

      • ReceivingEnabled

        public int ReceivingEnabled()
        Gets whether you want the MessageReceived(String,String) event to get run when a new text message is received.
        Returns:
        1,2 or 3 indicating that receiving is disabled (1) or foreground only (2) or always (3). MessageReceived(String,String) event to get run when a new text message is received.

      • ReceivingEnabled

        public void ReceivingEnabled(int enabled)
        Sets whether you want the MessageReceived(String,String) event to get run when a new text message is received.
        Parameters:
        enabled - 0 = never receive, 1 = receive foreground only, 2 = receive always

      • isReceivingEnabled

        public static int isReceivingEnabled(Context context)

      • getMessagesFromIntent

        public static SmsMessage[] getMessagesFromIntent(Intent intent)
        Parse the messages out of the extra fields from the "android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS" broadcast intent. Note: This code was copied from the Android android.provider.Telephony.Sms.Intents class.
        Parameters:
        intent - the intent to read from
        Returns:
        an array of SmsMessages for the PDUs

      • processCachedMessages

        private void processCachedMessages()
        Sends all the messages in the cache through MessageReceived and clears the cache.

      • handleSentMessage

        private void handleSentMessage(Context context,
                               BroadcastReceiver receiver,
                               int resultCode,
                               java.lang.String smsMsg)
        Callback method to handle the result of attempting to send a message. Each message is assigned a Broadcast receiver that is notified by the phone's radio regarding the status of the sent message. The receivers call this method. (See transmitMessage() method below.)
        Parameters:
        context - The context in which the calling BroadcastReceiver is running.
        receiver - Currently unused. Intended as a special BroadcastReceiver to send results to. (For instance, if another plugin wanted to do its own handling.)
        resultCode, - the code sent back by the phone's Radio
        seq, - the message's sequence number
        smsMsg, - the message being processed

      • sendViaSms

        private void sendViaSms()
        Sends a text message via SMS. No authentication required. This method is called only when the UseGoogleVoice option is disabled.

      • onStop

        public void onStop()
        Save the component's state in shared preference file before it is killed.
        Specified by:
